languages.text: {n}Абеляр деловито хлопает в ладоши, в неаугментированном глазу загорается недобрый огонек.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, какая удача застать вас ничем не занят{mf|ым|ой}! Раз у вас выдалась минутка, я считаю своим долгом провести лекцию по истории династии фон Валанциус. Начнем с самого начала..."

{n}Abelard claps his hands together in a business-like manner, and there's an ominous glint in his unaugmented eye.{/n} "Lord Captain, what a fortunate rarity to find you at leisure! Since you have nothing else to occupy your time, I will give you a lecture on the history of House von Valancius. I would not be doing my duty if I did not start from the beginning... "
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр деловито хлопает в ладоши, в неаугментированном глазу загорается недобрый огонек.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, какая удача застать вас ничем не занят{mf|ым|ой}! Раз у вас выдалась минутка, я считаю своим долгом провести лекцию по истории династии фон Валанциус. Начнем с самого начала..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard claps his hands with determination, and you see an ominous glint in his unaugmented eye.{/n} "Lord Captain, it is a rare fortune to see you not preoccupied with anything at all! Since you are available, I consider it my duty to give you a lecture on the history of House von Valancius. Allow me to start at the very beginning..."

{n}Abelard claps his hands with determination, and you see an ominous glint in his unaugmented eye.{/n} "Lord Captain, it is a rare fortune to see you not preoccupied with anything at all! Since you are available, I consider it my duty to give you a lecture on the history of House von Valancius. Allow me to start at the very beginning..."

{n}Abelard claps his hands together in a business-like manner, and there's an ominous glint in his unaugmented eye.{/n} "Lord Captain, what a fortunate rarity to find you at leisure! Since you have nothing else to occupy your time, I will give you a lecture on the history of House von Valancius. I would not be doing my duty if I did not start from the beginning... "

{n}Abelard claps his hands together in a business-like manner, and there's an ominous glint in his unaugmented eye.{/n} "Lord Captain, what a fortunate rarity to find you at leisure! Since you have nothing else to occupy your time, I will give you a lecture on the history of House von Valancius. I would not be doing my duty if I did not start from the beginning... "

{n}Abelard claps his hands together in a business-like manner, and there's an ominous glint in his unaugmented eye.{/n} "Lord Captain, what a fortunate rarity to find you at leisure! Since you have nothing else to occupy your time, I will give you a lecture on the history of House von Valancius. I would not be doing my duty if I did not start from the beginning... "

languages.text: {n}Abélard tape dans ses mains d'un air sérieux et vous lance de son œil naturel un regard qui n'augure rien de bon.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, qu'il est rare de vous voir au repos ! Puisque vous n'avez rien d'autre pour occuper votre temps, je vais profiter de cette aubaine pour vous raconter l'histoire de la maison von Valancius. Évidemment, je pécherais par négligence si je ne commençais pas ma leçon du début... »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard claps his hands together in a business-like manner, and there's an ominous glint in his unaugmented eye.{/n} "Lord Captain, what a fortunate rarity to find you at leisure! Since you have nothing else to occupy your time, I will give you a lecture on the history of House von Valancius. I would not be doing my duty if I did not start from the beginning... "

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard tape dans ses mains d'un air sérieux et vous lance de son œil naturel un regard qui n'augure rien de bon.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, qu'il est rare de vous voir au repos ! Puisque vous n'avez rien d'autre pour occuper votre temps, je vais profiter de cette aubaine pour vous raconter l'histoire de la maison von Valancius. Évidemment, je pécherais par négligence si je ne commençais pas ma leçon du début... »

languages.text: {n}Abelard junta las manos en un gesto formal y ves un brillo siniestro en su ojo natural.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán, es excepcional encontrarl{mf|e|a} libre! Ya que no tiene otro entretenimiento, le daré una lección sobre la historia de la casa von Valancius. No cumpliría bien con mi deber si no empezara por el principio...».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard claps his hands together in a business-like manner, and there's an ominous glint in his unaugmented eye.{/n} "Lord Captain, what a fortunate rarity to find you at leisure! Since you have nothing else to occupy your time, I will give you a lecture on the history of House von Valancius. I would not be doing my duty if I did not start from the beginning... "

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard junta las manos en un gesto formal y ves un brillo siniestro en su ojo natural.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán, es excepcional encontrarl{mf|e|a} libre! Ya que no tiene otro entretenimiento, le daré una lección sobre la historia de la casa von Valancius. No cumpliría bien con mi deber si no empezara por el principio...».

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德带着公事公办的态度拍了拍手，他那只没有植入物的眼睛中闪烁着不祥的光芒。{/n}“难得您这么悠闲，舰长大人！既然您没有其他的事情可做，那不如让我给您讲讲冯·瓦兰修斯家族的历史吧。话说回来，如果不从头开始讲的话，那恐怕就太失职了……”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard claps his hands together in a business-like manner, and there's an ominous glint in his unaugmented eye.{/n} "Lord Captain, what a fortunate rarity to find you at leisure! Since you have nothing else to occupy your time, I will give you a lecture on the history of House von Valancius. I would not be doing my duty if I did not start from the beginning... "

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德带着公事公办的态度拍了拍手，他那只没有植入物的眼睛中闪烁着不祥的光芒。{/n}“难得您这么悠闲，舰长大人！既然您没有其他的事情可做，那不如让我给您讲讲冯·瓦兰修斯家族的历史吧。话说回来，如果不从头开始讲的话，那恐怕就太失职了……”

languages.text: {n}アベラルドはビジネス調に拍手する。彼の目には不吉な光が宿っていた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン。あなたが暇を持て余しているなんて、珍しい！他にやることもないでしょうから、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の歴史について講義をいたしましょう。最初から始めなければ、私の義務を果たしたことにはなりませんね…」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard claps his hands together in a business-like manner, and there's an ominous glint in his unaugmented eye.{/n} "Lord Captain, what a fortunate rarity to find you at leisure! Since you have nothing else to occupy your time, I will give you a lecture on the history of House von Valancius. I would not be doing my duty if I did not start from the beginning... "

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドはビジネス調に拍手する。彼の目には不吉な光が宿っていた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン。あなたが暇を持て余しているなんて、珍しい！他にやることもないでしょうから、フォン・ヴァランシウス家の歴史について講義をいたしましょう。最初から始めなければ、私の義務を果たしたことにはなりませんね…」

languages.text: {n}Abelard klatscht geschäftig in die Hände. In seinem nicht augmentierten Auge liegt ein bedrohliches Funkeln.{/n} "Lord Captain, welch glückliche Seltenheit, Euch beim Müßiggang vorzufinden! Da Ihr keinen besseren Zeitvertreib habt, halte ich Euch einen kleinen Vortrag über die Geschichte des Hauses Valancius. Ich würde meine Pflicht vernachlässigen, würde ich nicht ganz von vorne beginnen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard claps his hands together in a business-like manner, and there's an ominous glint in his unaugmented eye.{/n} "Lord Captain, what a fortunate rarity to find you at leisure! Since you have nothing else to occupy your time, I will give you a lecture on the history of House von Valancius. I would not be doing my duty if I did not start from the beginning... "
